lead_paragraph: The minister for European affairs suggested that Argentines as a whole, and not just Pope Francis, had been brainwashed by rich and powerful Armenians in their midst.

headline.main: Stung by Pope’s Remarks on Armenian Genocide, Turkish Minister Insults Argentina
headline.print_headline: Stung by Pope’s Remarks on Armenian Genocide, Turkish Minister Insults Argentina
